languages.text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.
languages.original_text: Носящий эту броню всецело служит Неумирающему — этому свидетельствуют мрачные клятвы на печатях чистоты и запекшиеся пятна крови бесчисленных врагов.

traits.locale_text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

languages.text: Носящий эту броню всецело служит Неумирающему — этому свидетельствуют мрачные клятвы на печатях чистоты и запекшиеся пятна крови бесчисленных врагов.

El portador de esta armadura sirve al Emperador Inmortal con absoluta devoción, como demuestran los siniestros votos inscritos en los sellos de pureza y las manchas de sangre seca de innumerables enemigos.
languages.original_text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

traits.locale_text: El portador de esta armadura sirve al Emperador Inmortal con absoluta devoción, como demuestran los siniestros votos inscritos en los sellos de pureza y las manchas de sangre seca de innumerables enemigos.

languages.text: この鎧の着用者は不死の皇帝に完全なる献身を捧げている。それは、純潔の印章に刻まれた厳しい誓いと、数え切れないほどの敵の乾いた血痕が証明している。
languages.original_text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

traits.locale_text: この鎧の着用者は不死の皇帝に完全なる献身を捧げている。それは、純潔の印章に刻まれた厳しい誓いと、数え切れないほどの敵の乾いた血痕が証明している。

languages.text: 这套护甲的佩戴者，会以牢不可破的忠诚侍奉不死神皇。无论是护甲纯洁印记上烙着的严峻誓言，还是无数敌人干涸的血迹，都能证明这一点。
languages.original_text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

traits.locale_text: 这套护甲的佩戴者，会以牢不可破的忠诚侍奉不死神皇。无论是护甲纯洁印记上烙着的严峻誓言，还是无数敌人干涸的血迹，都能证明这一点。

languages.text: Der Träger dieser Rüstung dient dem Todlosen Imperator mit unbedingter Hingabe, was die grimmigen Schwüre auf den Reinheitssiegeln sowie die eingetrockneten Blutspuren von unzähligen Gegnern belegen.
languages.original_text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger dieser Rüstung dient dem Todlosen Imperator mit unbedingter Hingabe, was die grimmigen Schwüre auf den Reinheitssiegeln sowie die eingetrockneten Blutflecken von unzähligen Gegnern belegen.

languages.text: La personne qui porte cette armure sert l'Empereur Immortel avec une dévotion absolue, comme en témoignent les funestes vœux gravés sur ses sceaux de pureté et le sang séché d'innombrables adversaires.
languages.original_text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

traits.locale_text: La personne qui porte cette armure sert l'Empereur Immortel avec une dévotion absolue, comme en témoignent les funestes vœux gravés sur ses sceaux de pureté et le sang séché d'innombrables adversaires.

languages.text: Bu zırhı giyen kişi, Ölmeyen İmparator'a mutlak bir bağlılıkla hizmet eder. Saflık mühürleri üzerindeki acımasız antlar ve sayısız düşmana ait kurumuş kan lekeleri, bunun kanıtı niteliğindedir.
languages.original_text: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.
